metadata.value: [{"id":1,"q":"Does the product help in preventing premature hair graying?","a":"Consuming Healthier Hair Gummies for Faster Hair Growth with Biotin, Amla & Green Tea alone is not sufficient to prevent premature hair graying. It's important to note that hair health is influenced by various factors, including genetics, overall health, & lifestyle habits. So while consuming Plix hair gummies can be a helpful addition to your hair care routine, it's not a magic solution for all hair problems. Maintaining a healthy & balanced lifestyle, including eating a nutritious diet, managing stress levels, & avoiding harsh hair treatments, is crucial for preventing premature hair graying"},{"id":2,"q":"Are Plix hair gummies purely vegan?","a":"Plix's Healthier Hair Gummies for Faster Hair Growth with Biotin, Amla & Green Tea are part of our line of products that are completely vegan, meaning they are free from any animal products or byproducts. Our commitment to using only plant-based ingredients in our products ensures that they are suitable for anyone following a vegan lifestyle or with dietary restrictions."},{"id":3,"q":"Does it help with beard growth?","a":"While Plix's Healthier Hair Gummies for Faster Hair Growth with Biotin, Amla & Green Tea are formulated with nutrients that support healthy hair growth, they are not specifically designed to promote beard hair growth. Plix hair gummies are formulated to provide essential vitamins & minerals that nourish the scalp & support healthy hair growth."},{"id":4,"q":"Are the Healthier Hair Gummies sugar-free?","a":"That's correct! Plix hair gummies do not contain any refined sugars or artificial sweeteners that can be detrimental to your health."},{"id":5,"q":"Is gummy recommended for pregnant women?","a":"It's important to note that before taking Plix's Healthier Hair Gummies for Faster Hair Growth with Biotin, Amla & Green Tea , pregnant or lactating women, as well as individuals with known medical conditions, should consult with a healthcare professional. This is because certain medical conditions or medications may interact with the ingredients in our gummies, which could potentially cause adverse effects. node.review: I've been having these deliciously fruity hair gummies from Plix for about three months now. I really have to say that they smell and taste amazing! I somehow witnessed no improvements or changes for the first two weeks but then as I saw other reviews mentioning its results in the latter weeks, I kept going. Around the first month, I noticed improvements in my scalp health. It started to feel more nourished and non-flaky or irritable. Post the second month, my hair quality improved as it started to feel much finer, healthier, and better. Even now, I'm actively consuming these gummies and my hair fall has started to reduce gradually. This is a must buy for anyone wanting delicious hair care alternatives!
node.adminReply: Hey Devesh! Thank you for your appreciation. We take great care while making the products to make it effective and tasty at the same time. It's great that you are using the product regularly because you'll see lasting and visible results only if you are consistently using the product. Do add 3% Redensyl Hair Growth Serum in your hair care routine. For more information, drop a mail to us at hello@plixlife.com. Take Care, Have Fun!
